bug.author: sofuture
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
The wiki documentation references the incorrect image on this page: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/2.-Getting-started#using-docker-image>https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/2.-Getting-started#using-docker-image</denchmark-link>
It should be researchdeezer/spleeter instead of deezer/spleeter. <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
visit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/2.-Getting-started#using-docker-image>https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/2.-Getting-started#using-docker-image</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
n/a <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
n/a <denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
n/a

comments.comment: Too bad you can't PR wikis :/
